mapper.insert: insert into email_auth (email, code, expired_at) values(#{email}, #{code}, DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 5 MINUTE))
mapper.update: update email_auth set code = #{code}, expired_at = DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 5 MINUTE) where email = #{email}
mapper.select: select email, code, expired_at from email_auth where email = #{email}
